## getTextureFormatBlockHeight() function

Get block height of given texture format

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function getTextureFormatBlockHeight(format: TextureFormat): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  format | [TextureFormat](doc/markdown/./device.textureformat.md) | The texture format |

**Returns:**

number

The block height
